column1: Little Goat Diner////If fried food is your calling the onion rings and fried pickles are must try. They include a curry mayo that adds the perfect spice to to a sinfully yummy dish. As a lover of all things BBQ
column2: I had to try the Bbq Pork Sammich. Boy did I make the right choice! The mixture of the bbq sauce and chipotle mayo made my tastebuds tingle! It was the perfect cap to my cheat day.
